message: Let's start with a fair split.  I'm willing to give you 40% since you are taking more of the risk with the decreasing value of your share.
I appreciate your offer, but I think we can do better.  I'm taking a bigger risk with the decreasing value of my share, so I propose we split it 55/45. Let's work together!
Let's meet in the middle. A 50/50 split seems fairest given the inflation we're both facing.  We can both get something, and avoid further devaluation.
